articles.title: Russia's hybrid warfare rattles Poland and NATO - NPR
articles.description: Russia is stepping up covert attacks across Europe — rail sabotage, drones, cyberstrikes — testing NATO. Polish officials warn "disposable agents" are sowing fear and weakening support for Ukraine.
articles.content: MIKA and WARSAW, Poland The hike to the site of what local authorities believe to be Russia's latest act of rail sabotage on Polish soil leads police officer Piotr Pokorski trudging through a couple … [+4848 chars]
